sources.title: Here Come the Co-eds (1945)
sources.description: Three ballroom dancers fake their way into college, but saving the school from foreclosure takes more than charm. From wrestling ring mishaps to basketball madness—with Oliver in drag believing he’s a sports legend—this wild comedy of errors races through chaos, cons, and a high-speed sailboat chase. Can they pull it off and save Bixby College? Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/here-come-the-co-eds-1945/

metadata.Plot: Two bumblers become caretakers at an all-girls' college. During their misadventures, the duo raise money to free the school from its traditionally-minded landlord.
metadata.Writer: Edmund L. Hartmann, John Grant, Arthur T. Horman
metadata.Actors: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Peggy Ryan
